Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: Possibly one of the most eccentric and DUTCH bars in Amsterdam. Prepare to only pay in CASH. On a weekday you can have a relatively quiet beer here and marvel at the carnival of colour and decor that adorns the walls and ceilings. â€¦

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: This bar is beyond any expectations you might have. Its one of my favorite places in town. If you're in the neighborhood definitely visit.

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: What a perfect place for locals to enjoy real Amsterdam hospitality! This place is really not recommended for tourists, as they will not understand how to behave and how the bar works. Please do grab a pint but leave quickly and above all silently. I can only say I loved the bar from my first visit. Purposely gave 3 stars

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: always great! good vibe & cheap beer

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: One of the most characteristic and unusual bars I've ever encountered in Amsterdam. the place is always decorated according to the theme of the season (Christmas, Halloween...). The beer is quite cheap, and the atmosphere very cozy and active at the same time. Try it out on an after dinner wonder trough oost.

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: This is a brilliant typical little dutch bar with carpets on the tables and smoke in the air, but with a twist. The interior is so gaudy you have to laugh. From the gold foil covering the ceiling to the clown masks adorning the walls you â€¦

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: A dive bar with plenty of character. Cash only, only Heineken on tap, no food except peanuts. But a tacky, fun, working-class Amsterdam kind of vibe

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: Very fun bar with cool decorations, also beer has good prices!

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: A quaint and we'll known local establishment. A typical folk pub popular with the local neighbor.  Has a fun and quirky decor.

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: Seems like a small town pub with the same local customers. At first, staff is a bit suspicious of you, but after the 4th beer you are one of them! Funny experience.

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: This bar goes all in on Christmas. I have never seen so many decorations. People are drunk and easy to talk to.

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: Really an unique gem, unique personality, always awesome people inside and the vibe.. how to describe it.. you need to be there to understand :)

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: Very nice atmosphere but too busy in the weekend. I had to wait 20 minutes to ask for a beer..

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: My favorite bar in Amsterdam. Friendly regulars, lots of snacks, and more tinsel at Christmas than you can fathom.

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: They go all-out decorating for every holiday, and LGBTQ friendly.

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text: One of the few authentic Dutch "bruine kroeg" that are still around in Amsterdam Oost. Fascinating interior.

Name: Ruk en Pluk
Review Text:
